) } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { form: state.form.buildForm } } export default reduxForm({ form: 'buildForm', validate, initialValues: { primary: '#9d0000', secondary: '#f2c8c9', bgName: 'main', bgColor: '#572c0f', components: 'all', enableRoot: true, enableInverse: true, enableContrast: true, enableTrans: true, enableGray: true, enableDarken: false, enableLighten: false, select2: false, datepicker: false, navbar: false, carousel: false, alert: false, badge: false, breadcrumb: false, buttonGroup: false, buttons: false, card: false, code: false, customForms: false, forms: false, dropdown: false, inputGroup: false, jumbotron: false, listGroup: false, media: false, modal: false, nav: false, pagination: false, popover: false, progress: false, tables: false, tooltip: false, } })(connect(mapStateToProps)(BuildForm));
